name: Out of Sight
description:
Out of Sight is a relaxing hidden object game designed to help you unwind. Play each level at your own pace and discover every secret the beautifully vibrant worlds have to offer. Once you find enough objects, advance to the next level or stay, take in the views and enjoy the chill lofi soundtrack.





  • Gorgeous, vibrant colours
  • A very chill lofi soundtrack
  • Randomised object locations for each playthough
  • Great to relax for half an hour and beat your latest highscore
  • An unobtrusive score system for some light competition between friends
  • Full controller support and the ability to play with just a keyboard or just a mouse

Please don't hesitate to contact me if you have feedback, questions, or issues with the game. I’ll do my best to give you a speedy response and provide support if needed. Also, I'd love to know if you enjoyed the game!
